rounds_per_minute.description: Rounds per minute depending on weapon setting.

infinite_ammo.description: [bool]True if this projectile weapon can never run out of ammo.

rpc_synced_fire_events.description: [bool]ONLY USE FOR SINGLE-FIRE/SLOW FIRING WEAPONS. Primarily useful for sniper rifles, explosive one-shots etc. that need the firing event to be highly accurately synced!

fire_single_audio_event.description: [wwise]The audio event to trigger when doing single-fire (if we don't have looping sounds).

fire_all_barrel_audio_event.description: [wwise]The audio event to trigger when FireMode_AllBarrel is triggered.

fire_fail_audio_event.description: [wwise]The audio event to trigger when the arc fails to hit anything on the first shot.

haptics_fire_single_audio_event.description: [wwise]The audio event to trigger when doing single-fire (if we don't have looping sounds).

fire_source_node.description: [string]The node to play the firing audio events at.

on_round_fired_shakes.description: Settings for local and in-world camera shakes to play on every round fired.

muzzle_flash.description: [particles]Particle effect of the muzzle flash, played on attach_muzzle.

muzzle_flash_fail.description: [particles]Particle effect of the muzzle flash, when the arc weapon fails to hit, played on attach_muzzle.
